Detailed Description

Header file for molecule structures

File begun May 2007 by Lachele Foley and modified continually ever since by Lachele Foley and others, including Mike Tessier.

Definition in file molecules.h.

Define Documentation

00031                         dip.j+=m[0].r[ta].a[tb].ch[chgsrc]*(m[0].r[ta].a[tb].x.j-com.j);
00032                         dip.k+=m[0].r[ta].a[tb].ch[chgsrc]*(m[0].r[ta].a[tb].x.k-com.k);
00033                         }
00034                 }
00035         }
00036 else{
00037         for(ta=0;ta<m[0].nr;ta++){ 
00038                 for(tb=0;tb<m[0].r[ta].na;tb++){ 
00039                         tuse=malloc_usable_size(m[0].r[ta].a[tb].xa);
00040                         tsz=sizeof(coord_3D);
00041                         tbins=tuse/tsz; 
00042                         if(tbins<(xs+1)){mywhine("memory issue: source coords not allocated in get_molecule_point_charge_dipole");}
00043                         dip.i+=m[0].r[ta].a[tb].ch[chgsrc]*(m[0].r[ta].a[tb].xa[xs].i-com.i);
00044                         dip.j+=m[0].r[ta].a[tb].ch[chgsrc]*(m[0].r[ta].a[tb].xa[xs].j-com.j);
00045                         dip.k+=m[0].r[ta].a[tb].ch[chgsrc]*(m[0].r[ta].a[tb].xa[xs].k-com.k);
00046                         }
00047                 }
00048         }
00049 dip.d=get_magnitude(dip);
00050 
00051 return dip;
00052 }

00057 if(cZ.d==0){mywhine("zero-length vector passed to rotate_vector_to_Z (can't rotate to that)");}
00058

00060         // set abitrary point in new XY plane for positive Y position
00061         cY.i=cZ.i; // set xY=iZ
00062         cY.k=cZ.k; // set zY=kZ

00064         // turn that into a unit vector (make into direction cosines)
00065         cY=normalize_vec(cY); 
00066         // get direction cosines for unit vector along new X axis
00067         // (this is the X-prod of the new Y and Z axes)
00068         cX=get_crossprod(cZ,cY);
00069         }
00070 else{ // the i component isn't zero (or we would have exited)
00071         // set abitrary point in new XY plane for positive X position
00072         cX.j=cZ.j; // set yX=jZ, which is zero or we wouldn't be here...
00073         cX.k=cZ.k; // set zX=kZ
00074         cX.i=-(cZ.k*cZ.k)/cZ.i;  ; // solve for yY in X-Y plane
00075         // turn that into a unit vector (make into direction cosines)
00076         cX=normalize_vec(cX); 
00077         // get direction cosines for unit vector along new X axis
00078         // (this is the X-prod of the new Y and Z axes)
00079         cY=get_crossprod(cZ,cX);
00080         }
00081

00084         RC.i=cX.i*XS[ra].i + cX.j*XS[ra].j + cX.k*XS[ra].k;
00085         RC.j=cY.i*XS[ra].i + cY.j*XS[ra].j + cY.k*XS[ra].k;
00086         RC.k=cZ.i*XS[ra].i + cZ.j*XS[ra].j + cZ.k*XS[ra].k;
00087         XS[ra]=RC;
00088         }
00089 
00090 return;
00091 }

00010 nv.k=v.k*s;
00011 
00012 // don't trust the d in nv
00013 nv.d=sqrt(nv.i*nv.i+nv.j*nv.j+nv.k*nv.k);
00014 
00015 return nv;
00016 }
